Class LoseWorld

java.lang.Object
  




public class LoseWorld
extends FinishWorld

The world displays an end screen to tell the user that they have lost, and displays their statistics including their money, enemies killed, and what wave they were on when they lost.

IMAGE CREDIT: https://images7.alphacoders.com/310/310611.jpg

Version:
June 2018
Author:
Maggie Lin, Shivani Chidella, Kyle Chan

Constructor Detail

LoseWorld

public LoseWorld(GameWorld game)
Constructor for objects of class FinishWorld. It is created when a user loses their lives and cannot complete all the waves. It creates an 800x600 size world, and adds a return to menu button that will take the user back to the start world.

Parameters:
game - The game that has the statistics to display on the screen
